mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_estimate(dates, list, budget, remark, isYn, types, payTypes) VALUES(#{dates}, #{list}, #{budget}, #{remark}, #{isYn}, #{types}, #{payTypes});
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_estimate SET dates = #{dates}, list = #{list}, budget = #{budget}, remark = #{remark}, isYn = #{isYn}, types = #{types}, payTypes = #{payTypes} WHERE `no` = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_estimate ORDER BY isYn = "지출완료" desc, dates asc

SELECT truncate(sum(total.budget),0) as total ,truncate(sum(( select c.budget from tbl_estimate c where c.`no` = total.`no` and c.isYn = "지출완료")),0) as completed ,truncate(sum(( select c.budget from tbl_estimate c where c.`no` = total.`no` and c.isYn = "미지출")),0) as required FROM tbl_estimate total
